video_prompt: Crane gracefully lifts off a fluffy island, wings beating softly, as surrounding wool flowers gently sway on shimmering blue water. Cherry blossom branches subtly unfurl overhead, releasing delicate pink petals that drift down. Background colors imperceptibly shift from soft blue to pink.
image_prompt: Needle-felted, wool-crafted fantasy landscape: a white crane on a fluffy island amidst calm blue water with delicate pink cherry blossoms, under a pastel sky with blooming branches. Soft textures, ethereal, tranquil.
refined_video_prompt: A crane gracefully lifts off, wings softly beating. Surrounding wool flowers gently sway on shimmering water. Overhead, cherry blossom branches subtly unfurl, releasing petals that drift down. Background colors imperceptibly shift from blue to pink.
